page.title: 11ETHIOPIA
page.content: Mr.Astle and Mr.Whatlin organised an Ethiopian Appeal for all the school to raise Â£1 each.Some people did events like Bike Rides,Swimming,and Running. Most people entered this Appeal,and tried to raise Â£1 or more,some of use raised over Â£10 or Â£20 each. Also people would buy Raffle Tickets to try and win an album or framed photo of Pop Stars.All the money will go to the Appeal.We have raised Â£6,375 to try and get Howard Jones to give a concert at our school.Mr.Astle & Mr.Whatlin have had two pop auctions which raised over Â£400 besides the one we have had at dinnertimes.There have been slide shows of Pop groups.Some of the pupils had a 5-a-side football match to raise money.The appeal has been successful, and Howard Jones will be coming to give a Concert at our School.
